about.title: About Me
about.summary: Dynamic and detail-oriented Front-End Developer with proven experience in utilizing frameworks such as Vue.js, React.js, and Svelte. Known for delivering high-impact web applications that enhance user engagement through intuitive and aesthetically pleasing user interfaces. Demonstrates a strong commitment to continuously advancing technical skills in line with the latest industry trends.

summary.main: In my current role at Dimpoint Studios, I am working on a project to completely revamp and implement an Illustrator design for the company's portfolio. My focus is on using Nuxt and advanced CSS techniques to develop a responsive and visually appealing user interface. Previously, In this position, I played a key role in developing solutions using Vue 3, GSAP, Tailwind for the development of Aizhak Coffee:

bullet_points: Collaborated closely with the designer, product manager, marketing, and other developers.
Translated creative concepts into functional interfaces, optimizing for performance and responsiveness.
I implemented complex animations using GSAP and the Vue animation API.

summary.main: In my role at Deduce Data Solutions, I was instrumental in developing the company's website from scratch, using Vue.js integrated with Nuxt.js and Storyblok CMS. In this project, I received a design from Figma to translate into code and enhance with additional dynamics such as 3D graphics libraries. I implemented a pagination system for the blog and, utilizing the Storyblok API and developed a multi-language system to support various languages.

During my time as a freelance front-end developer, I led and contributed to multiple impactful projects that showcased my expertise in modern web technologies and user experience design. Highlights of my work include:

bullet_points: Rebranded a website by implementing a new color scheme and CSS theming system. Ensured consistent and appealing visual indentity across all pages and improved the user experience and accesibility.
Successfully migrated the existing church website to Subsplash CMS, redesigned and organized information as per the client’s requirements, enhancing clarity and user navigation.
I added a events, email and calendar system consuming the Subsplash API’s.
Developed a social media app for food enthusiasts improving accessibility. Integrated Firebase for seamless data management and real-time updates.
